name: Stronger Together - Flapping Birds
description:
Hello Everyone!

My name is Kim and this is my first game jam.

I recreated a flappy bird style like game and added duplication of the birds mechanic to fit the theme.
I currently work at an office around 8:30 to 6:00 pm, so I only have a limited amount of time.
I worked at this game during 7:30 pm to 10 pm for 4-5 days.

Credits:

Flappy Bird Asset by: Unity Technologies
Background by: craftpix.net
SFX by: Think Media
Music by: FesilyanStduios

Thank you for playing! ✌🎉👍🙂✨

A game submitted to the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
